name: The Offering
description:
A vast wilderness. A mysterious past. An ancient legend.

While on a trip to lush, rural Iceland to meet her family, a young child becomes acquainted with a cousin who soon goes missing.  Setting off to investigate the disappearance alone, the child begins to uncover secrets of her family's mysterious past. 

FEATURES
  • A fresh take on an Ink-integrated visual novel
  • Over an hour of compelling interactive storytelling
  • 60+ lovingly painted scenes 
  • Original score
  • Emotionally impactful narrative choice 

Created by: scramp
